thread.title: AssureSign Strengthens Leadership Team with Hiring of Insurance Industry Veteran Dianna George as New General Manager of Global Insurance Solutions
thread.title_full: AssureSign Strengthens Leadership Team with Hiring of Insurance Industry Veteran Dianna George as New General Manager of Global Insurance Solutions - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AssureSign Strengthens Leadership Team with Hiring of Insurance Industry Veteran Dianna George as New General Manager of Global Insurance Solutions
text:
Veteran Electronic Signature Company Reinforces Commitment to Insurance Industry in Advance of Applied.Net Client Network Conference
Atlanta (PRWEB) September 23, 2015
Electronic signature software provider, AssureSign, today announced the hiring of Dianna George to the newly-created position of general manager of global insurance solutions. In her role, George will direct operations and support for AssureSign’s insurance industry customers, and will lead strategic business development efforts within the insurance vertical. She will report to AssureSign’s Vice President of Sales, Larry Torri.
George joins AssureSign after a15-year tenure with global insurance brokerage firm HUB International, where she worked as IT site manager and operations advisor for seven of the company’s agencies across North America. For more than a decade, George has also been as a prominent member of the Applied Client Network, the world’s largest group of educators and advocates for users of Applied Systems Software. George served as president of the Ontario chapter of Applied Client Network for four terms, while also performing as a lead member of the Canadian industry solutions committee for three terms.
“Dianna has spent nearly two decades as an insurance industry technologist and operations manager, giving her the depth and know-how to deliver unbeatable client service to our insurance industry customers,” said David Brinkman, AssureSign president and CEO. “We’re extremely well-positioned to continue as the leading e-signature provider for insurance agents worldwide.”
George’s hiring comes on the heels of a spike in the number of new AssureSign customers in the insurance vertical, including Knight Insurance Group, which deployed electronic signature in May of this year, subsequently cutting average client policy return times in half. AssureSign remains the primary choice in electronic signature among buyers in the insurance sector because of its flexible pricing model, on-premise, cloud and hybrid deployment options, robust security, and its award-winning customer service. Aside from growth in the insurance agent customers, AssureSign is experiencing a record volume of electronic signature transactions as a result of the company’s upgraded mobile application and the launch of its small business product, InScribe.
“AssureSign is well-known among insurers as the most trusted, secure and reliable provider of electronic signature for agents and brokerages,” said George. “I’m pleased to be joining this excellent team, and I’m eager to provide best-in-industry service to AssureSign’s growing base of insurance customers.”
AssureSign is a Silver Sponsor at the Applied.Net client network conference, the world’s largest gathering of insurance agents and brokers, taking place October19-22 in Las Vegas. To learn more about AssureSign, visit http://www.AssureSign.com or follow @AssureSign on Twitter.
About AssureSign
AssureSign simplifies the world’s most powerful action — the signature. Available as an on-premise, customizable solution for the enterprise, and as an on-demand SaaS solution for small business, AssureSign enables any business to create and execute a secure and seamless signature experience. By offering the electronic signature industry’s most flexible API, AssureSign has also built an extensive partner program with a proven revenue stream. Founded in 1999, AssureSign has executed over 300 million electronic signatures for many of the world’s most well-known brands.
